name: Khopra Kulfi Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Khopra Kulfi Recipe: Milk 1 tin Condensed Milk 1 tin Coconut Milk 1 tin Coconut Essence 1 tsp Desiccated Coconut Â½ cup Fresh Cream (whipped) 1 cup Khoya 1 cup
instructions: Chill all the milks for 2 hour at least beat evaporated milk until double. Add in it chilled condense milk, coconut milk and khoya, beat well Add essence fold in coconut and whipped cream. Mix well add in kulfi molds, freeze until form serve chill.
